title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Bloom's Taxonomy for Legal Research-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Skill Development

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic legal concepts and elementary math computation skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: By utilizing Bloom's Taxonomy's six levels (Remembering-Understanding-Applying-Analyzing-Evaluating-Creating), legal case-based mathematical problems can be systematically solved.
Through formative assessment, feedback can be reflected in real-time to revise problem-solving strategies.
In summative assessment, creative mathematical solutions applying legal logical structures can be presented.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
